name: ToolbarRoot
description:
A container for grouping a set of controls, such as buttons, toggle groups, or menus.
Renders a `<div>` element.

class.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

cols.description:
The number of columns. When greater than 1, the toolbar is arranged into
a grid.

loop.description: If `true`, using keyboard navigation will wrap focus to the other end of the toolbar once the end is reached.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-orientation.description: Indicates the orientation of the toolbar.

data-disabled.description: Present when the toolbar is disabled.
